title: Peter Kater - Spirit 1984 piano instrumental
description:
[i]First off, this CD was made in 1984. To get a CD pressed in 1984 was an achievement in itself and a huge investment. Then, it's "some guy playing a piano" we've never heard from before. Why would anyone listen to this?

Hit the play button and the notes will strike your soul. One immediately realized The Universe has bestowed a great gift to Peter and it's Peter's calling to share that gift with us. The Great Father looks down on Peter favorably. Give this a listen. It's okay to weep from the pure beauty. Lose yourself in the notes. Amazing.

- Big Papi[/i]
